title: Calories in Large Wendy's Fries
meta_description: Discover calories in large Wendy's fries (470 kcal per serving), plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, fat, sodium, and tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Wendy's Natural-Cut Fries, large size (approx. 170 g), fried as standard without modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion size. Based on Wendy's official data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A large serving of Wendy's fries provides 470 kcal, mainly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in large Wendy's fries?
What are the carbs in large Wendy's fries?
faqs.a: 62 g total carbs, including 6 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in Wendy's large fries?
faqs.a: 22 g total fat (4 g saturated) and 480 mg sodium.
No, they may contain gluten from shared fryers; check for allergies.

faqs.q: How does large compare to small Wendy's fries calories?
faqs.a: Small is about 300 kcal; large adds ~170 kcal.
